J1

modern static websites

The Starter Web of J1 Template is a full-featured template for Jekyll to create modern dynamic websites. The template system provides a clean implementation for starting new projects. Jekyll One is open source, and the modules packed are also free to use.

J1 Starter Web is designed to be lightweight and easily customizable. It comes with a basic structure and styling out of the box so that you can create a website quickly and easily, without having to worry about the code.

It features a modern, minimalist design with a focus on usability and accessibility. Additionally, it comes with built-in support for search engine optimization and social media integration, making it easy to get your site off the ground and running.

Explore what is possible when using static webs.
